attributes.action: establish a committee of taxpayers, randomly selected from constituencies other than that of the accused, on the HMRC database, to come together to investigate accusations of sleaze against elected politicians, instead of the current system of using friends, colleagues and ministerial subordinates of the accused to conduct the inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our current crop of politicians have NEVER been found guilty of any accusation of sleaze, continually being described as 'having broken no rules'.  This is clearly because they are investigating themselves and colluding over the result of any investigation.  Taxpayers are being taken for a ride and since they are the people bearing the cost and consequences of of the sleazy activity being perpetrated, then it is they who should conduct the investigation.
